task.title: Set up the desktop tripod
task.shortdesc: Four simple steps to set up the desktop tripod for use with the Valusinâ„¢ 10" ring light.

info.p: Align the ball head on the screw at the top of the desktop tripod, and twist until it becomes tight. One hand is holding the base of the tripod while the other hand attaches the ballhead to the top.

step.cmd: Attach the ring light to the tripod.

info.p: Align the screw on top of the tripod to the hole in the bottom of the ring light and twist until secure. One hand is holding the the tripod while the other hand attaches the ring light to the ball head.

step.cmd: Adjust the ring light using the ball head.

info.p: Twist the screw on the side of the ball head to rotate and tilt the ring light. Tighten the screw once the ring light is in the desired position. One hand is holding the right light while the other hand adjusts the tilt using the screw on the ball head.

image.alt: Completed desktop tripod setup with ring light and phone attached.
